short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Turn unread posts into a podcast made just for you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Turn unread posts into a podcast made just for you. Never miss an article again. 
We know you have hundreds of tabs open with articles you hope to read one day - you won't.
You are missing on so much information, it could really make a difference in your life.

With this extension you can generate a custom made podcast episode based on the articles you want to read. It works across the internet - try it in Newspapers, Medium, Substack, etc

You can then listen to these episodes directly in your podcast app, the one you use to listen to the normal podcasts.

More info at https://post2pod.com
